name: Be Human .IO
tagline: A differing ideology to how we use technology.
body:
### Our Primary Directive
* Be Human: don’t act like a machine to society, acknowledge them as we did pre-telephone.
* IO: To perform an input or output operation between human and machine; electronics are always used.

BeHuman.IO is a series of projects, experiments and exportation into the unknown, all under one common goal: for the betterment of society. Be them open source, free or paid, all their underlying use is to improve and enhance ourselves. Mind and body.

### Current Projects
* Be More .Clothing
Philadelphia's first independent fashionable wearables boutique.

### Past Projects
* Interpersonal Campus Security
An start to end system to watch and protect students as they to and from school.
* Philly Pack Walk
A service design to assist dog owner’s have their pet[s] walked when they are unable too because of work or other busy reasons. 
* In My Shoes
A virtual reality computer simulation platform designed to build empathy on an array of disorders & diseases by experiencing the another's world for a brief moment in time. You'll see the world as they do and internalize how they feel.
* Augmented Reality World Reactive System
Hearing, Visual & Mental user adaptive life Assistive device

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with viewing this? (https://help.github.com/pages) or [contact support](hello@bemore.clothing) and we’ll help you sort it out.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
